types:type.name: manifest
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type manifest = {| manifests: Array<{| "route-id": String, "item-id": String, barcode: String, "carrier-consignment-id": String, "container-id": String, "site-id": String, "location-id": String, quantity: Number {"typeId": "double"}, "shipping-date": String, "order-no": String, "carrier-id": String, status: String |}> |} {"example": "{\"manifests\":[{\"route-id\":\"18825022\",\"item-id\":\"4\",\"barcode\":\"ASKU023\",\"carrier-consignment-id\":\"27486104\",\"container-id\":\"MULT27486104C\",\"site-id\":\"ROYALMAIL\",\"location-id\":\"\",\"quantity\":10.00,\"shipping-date\":\"07-08-2019\",\"order-no\":\"18825022\",\"carrier-id\":\"HERMES\",\"status\":\"\"},{\"route-id\":\"18825023\",\"item-id\":\"4\",\"barcode\":\"ASKU023\",\"carrier-consignment-id\":\"27486105\",\"container-id\":\"MULT27486104D\",\"site-id\":\"ROYALMAIL\",\"location-id\":\"\",\"quantity\":10.00,\"shipping-date\":\"08-08-2019\",\"order-no\":\"18825023\",\"carrier-id\":\"HERMES\",\"status\":\"\"}]}"}
